subject: Lunda Language (ECE)

sub_topics.title: Kulumbulula yuma yamwitala
competences: Kulumbulula yuma yamwitala (Introduce things in the environment)

instructional_blocks.hook: Kuhema chisela chamansansa (Sing a song about body parts)
teacher_steps: Tambikaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Seat learners in a circle)
Twalaku anyana kwitala kulonda amoni yuma yawanikaña muchinsambu (Take children outside to see things in the environment)
Lezhaku atudizi ateni nakulumbululu yuma yawanikaña muchinsambu (Have learners name and introduce things they see in the environment)
Lezhaku atudizi ahoshi nyidimu yayuma yawanikaña muchinsambu (zhakutelekesha) (Have learners pronounce names of things in the environment - for practice)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in a circle)
Ayi kwitala hamu nantañishi nakutala yuma yawanikaña muchinsambu (Go outside with teacher and look at things in the environment)
Ateni nakulumbululu yuma yamonawu (Name and introduce things they see)
Ahoshi nyidimu yayuma yawanikaña muchinsambu (zhakutelekesha) (Pronounce names of things in the environment - for practice)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Muniwu mutu wansañu wanyanya, atudizi akudiza kulumbululu yuma yamwitala. (In this sub-topic, learners begin to introduce things in the environment/body)

teacher_steps: Tambikaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Seat learners in a circle)
Twalaku anyana kwitala kulonda amoni yuma yawanikaña mukapeka kakunokela (Take children to see things in the living room)
Lezhaku atudizi ateni nakulumbululu yuma yawanikaña mukapeka kakunokela (mesa, nyipandu, televizheni...) (Have learners name things in the living room - table, chairs, television...)
Lezhaku atudizi ahoshi nyidimu yayuma yawanikaña mukapeka kakunokela (Have learners pronounce names of furniture)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in a circle)
Ayi kwitala hamu nantañishi nakutala yuma yawanikaña mukapeka kakunokela (Go with teacher to look at things in the living room)
Ateni nakulumbululu yuma yamonawu (mesa, nyipandu, televizheni...) (Name things they see - table, chairs, television...)
Ahoshi nyidimu yayuma yawanikaña mukapeka kakunokela (Pronounce names of furniture)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwayuma yawanikaña mukapeka kakunokela. (Guide and help learners understand things in the living room)

questions: Yuma yamuchinsambu yinalumbululewi kuzatisha mazu ashikila (Things in the environment are introduced using appropriate words)
Yuma yamukapeka kakunokela yinalumbululewi kuzatisha mazu ashikila (Things in the living room are introduced using appropriate words)
assessment.expected_standard: Atudizi atela kutwesha kulumbululu yuma yamwitala mumulungu wumu (Learners should be able to introduce things in the environment in one term)

sub_topics.title: Yikunku yamazu (t, y, b)
competences: Kutena yikunku yamazu yidi mumazu aseeka mukuhosha (Identify syllables in simple oral words)
Kubomba yikunku yamazu nakutuña mazu aseeka mukuhosha hohu (Blend syllables and create simple oral words)
Kwambula mazu aseeka muyikunku yamazu amukuhosha hohu (Segment simple words into syllables orally)
Kutena chivumina chakukutachika kwezu mumazu aseeka mukuhosha (Identify initial sounds in simple oral words)

teacher_steps: Shakamishaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Arrange learners in a circle for instruction)
Mwekeshaku nyevulu hadi yuma yinatachiki nachivumina /t/ chidi neyi tata, tepu, teta (Show pictures of things starting with sound /t/ like tata, tepu, teta)
Hoshaku yikunku yamazu yidi mwizu (tata = ta/ta, tepu = te/pu, teta = te/ta) (Pronounce syllables in words)
Lumbululaku neyi mwizu tata mudi yikunku yamazu yiyedi (Explain that the word 'tata' has two syllables)
Lezhaku atudizi ateni nakuhosha yikunku yamazu yidi mumazu tata, tepu, teta (Have learners identify and pronounce syllables in words)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in a circle for instruction)
Atali nyevulu hadi yuma yinatachiki nachivumina /t/ chidi neyi tata, tepu, teta (Look at pictures of things starting with /t/)
Ahoshi yikunku yamazu yidi mwizu (tata, tepu, teta) (Pronounce syllables in words)
Ateni nakuhosha yikunku yamazu yidi mumazu (Identify and pronounce syllables in words)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: CHANUKISHI: Ilukaku neyi hiwatela kutañisha yivumina yezhima yisatu (t, y, b) hampinji yoyimuku. Watela kutañisha chivumina chimu hohu hampinji. (NOTE: Understand that you will teach all three sounds (t, y, b) but teach one sound at a time.)

instructional_blocks.hook: Imbaku kamina kayikunku yamazu (ta, ta - ta te ti to tu...) (Sing syllable patterns)
teacher_steps: Shakamishaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Arrange learners in instruction circle)
Mwekeshaku chati yayikunku yamazu (ta te ti to tu...) (Show syllable chart)
Lezhaku atudizi neyi, neyi wunona chikunku chezu wubomba nachikunku chezu chikwawu, wukutuña izu (Teach that when you join one syllable with another, you create a word)
Shakamishaku atudizi mumazanvu nakuyinka makadi ayikunku yamazu (tata, tepu, teta) (Arrange learners in groups and give syllable cards)
Lezhaku atudizi atuñi mazu aseeka mukuhosha kuzatisha yikunku yamazu (Have learners create simple words using syllables)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in instruction circle)
Atali chati yayikunku yamazu (Look at syllable chart)
Amwekeshi kubomba chikunku chezu nachikunku chezu chikwawu nakutuña mazu (Practice joining syllables to create words)
Ashakami mumazanvu nakutuña yikunku yamazu (Sit in groups and create syllables)
Atuñi mazu aseeka mukuhosha kuzatisha yikunku yamazu (Create simple words using syllables)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwayikunku yamazu yidi mumazu. (Guide and help learners understand syllables in words)

instructional_blocks.hook: Imbaku kamina kamazhina (chidi neyi: Atañishi - ka - kayinda, da - danyeli...) (Sing name patterns)
teacher_steps: Shakamishaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Arrange learners in circle)
Mwekeshaku makadi anyevulu yamboka mboka kudi atudizi (Show various picture cards to learners)
Lezhaku atudizi ahoshi nakutena mazhina ayuma yinakumonawu hanyevulu (temuka, tepu) (Have learners pronounce and identify names of things in pictures)
Mwekeshaku kadi yezu didi dezhima 'temuka' kudi atudizi (Show the word card 'temuka' to learners)
Mwekeshaku mukusakilila yikunku yamazu yidi munodu izu (temukaku = te/mu/ka/ku) (Demonstrate segmenting syllables in the word)
Zatishaku yifwiku yamabotolu, wusaña, mbutu... kulonda kwambula nachi yikunku yamazu (Use bottle tops, beans, stones... to represent and count syllables)
Lezhaku atudizi ambuli mazu muyikunku yamazu (Have learners segment words into syllables)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in circle)
Atali makadi anyevulu yamboka mboka kudi ntañishi (Look at various picture cards from teacher)
Ahoshi nakutena mazhina ayuma yinakumonawu hanyevulu (temuka, tepu) (Pronounce and identify names of things in pictures)
Amwekeshi mukusakilila yikunku yamazu yidi mwizu (temukaku = te/mu/ka/ku) (Practice segmenting syllables in words)
Azatishi yifwiku yamabotolu, wusaña, mbutu... kulonda kwambula yikunku yamazu (Use bottle tops, beans, stones... to segment syllables)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwakwambula mazu aseeka muyikunku yamazu mukuhosha. (Guide and help learners understand how to segment simple words into syllables orally)

instructional_blocks.hook: Hemaku chisela chakawayi-wayi kamusale... (Sing a children's song)
teacher_steps: Lezhaku atudizi ekali ashakama heluña dakutañila (Have learners sit in instruction circle)
Mwekeshaku chati yansona zhatutumwa (Show consonant letter chart)
Mwekeshaku kadi yezu kudi atudizi (tata yeña yita...) (Show word card to learners)
Mwekeshaku nakufunda nsona watachi mwizu (tata) (Point to initial letter in word)
Hoshaku chivumina chansona watachi mwizu (tata) /t/ (Pronounce initial sound in word /t/)
Shakamishaku atudizi mumazanvu nakuyinka makadi amazu amboka mboka (Arrange learners in groups and give various word cards)
Lezhaku atudizi ahoshi chivumina chansona watachi mumazu iwunayinki mumazanvu awu (Have learners pronounce initial sounds in words given to their groups)
Tambikaku ñimeni wumu kufuma mwizanvu kulonda ateni chivumina chansona watachi (Choose one member from each group to identify initial sound)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in instruction circle)
Atiyilili nakashinshi kuyuma yinakulumbululayi ntañishi (Listen carefully to teacher's explanation)
Ahoshi chivumina chansona watachi mwizu dinayinkiwu mumazanvu awu (tata) (Pronounce initial sound in word given to their group)
Ñimeni wumu kufuma mwizanvu ateni chivumina chansona watachi mumazu anayinkiwu (One member from each group identifies initial sound in words given)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kutena nikwilukisha chivumina chakukutachika kwezu mumazu aseeka mukuhosha. (Guide and help learners identify and understand initial sounds in simple oral words)

questions: Yikunku yamazu yidi mumazu amukuhosha hohu yinatenewi mwaloña (Syllables in simple oral words are identified correctly)
Yikunku yamazu yidi mumazu aseeka mukuhosha yinatenewi mwaloña (Syllables in simple words are blended correctly)
Mazu aseeka mukuhosha anambulewi muyikunku yamazu mwaloña (Simple words are segmented into syllables correctly)
Yivumina yakukutachika kwezu mumazu aseeka amukuhosha hohu yinatenewi mwaloña (Initial sounds in simple oral words are identified correctly)
assessment.expected_standard: Atudizi atela kutwesha kutena yikunku yamazu yidi mumazu mukuhosha munyilungu yiyedi (Learners should be able to identify syllables in oral words within seven terms)

instructional_blocks.hook: Imbaku kamina kazhinsona (nsona zhitanu mayala nsona zhitanu...) (Sing alphabet song)
teacher_steps: Tambikaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Seat learners in instruction circle)
Mwekeshaku kadi yansona /t/ (Show letter card /t/)
Hoshaku chivumina chansona /t/ hamu nawatudizi (Pronounce letter sound /t/ with learners)
Lezhaku atudizi ahoshi chivumina chansona /t/ (Have learners pronounce letter sound /t/)
Lezhaku atudizi ahoshi mazu atachika nachivumina /t/ tata, tala... (Have learners pronounce words starting with sound /t/)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in instruction circle)
Atali nsona /t/, hakadi (Look at letter /t/ on card)
Atiyilili nakashinshi kuchivumina /t/ (Listen carefully to sound /t/)
Ahoshi chivumina chansona /t/ hamu nantañishi (Pronounce letter sound /t/ with teacher)
Ahoshi yuma yatachika hela yekala nachivumina /t/ (teta, tala, tabu) (Pronounce things starting or containing sound /t/)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Tañishaku nakukolesha hachivumina chansona wumu mumulungu. (Teach and practice with one letter sound per term)

questions: Zhinsona zhinavumishewi mwaloña (Letters are pronounced correctly)
assessment.expected_standard: Atudizi atela kutwesha kuhosha yivumina yansona munyilungu yiyedi (Learners should be able to pronounce letter sounds within seven terms)

instructional_blocks.hook: Mwekeshaku nyevulu yamboka mboka (Show various pictures)
teacher_steps: Tambikaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Seat learners in instruction circle)
Mwekeshaku nyevulu yamboka mboka kudi atudizi (Show various pictures to learners)
Lezhaku atudizi alumbululi yuma yinakumonawu hanyevulu (Have learners describe what they see in pictures)
Lezhaku atudizi neyi nyevulu yalema nankashi muloña yatukwashañaku kwiluka chuma chacheni (Explain that pictures help us understand things better)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in instruction circle)
Atali nyevulu yinamwekeshewi (Look at pictures shown)
Alumbululi nyevulu (Describe pictures)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwakulumbululu nyevulu. (Guide and help learners understand how to describe pictures)

questions: Nyevulu yinalumbululewi mwatela (Pictures are described appropriately)
assessment.expected_standard: Atudizi atela kutwesha kulumbululu nyevulu mumulungu wumu (Learners should be able to describe pictures in one term)

sub_topics.title: Tuheka twaseeka (Simple stories)
competences: Kwakula malwihu anakundami kukaheka kaseeka (Answer questions about simple stories)

instructional_blocks.hook: Imbaku kamina katuheka (Sing a story song)
teacher_steps: Shakamishaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Arrange learners in instruction circle)
Lezhaku atudizi amweni zo-o nakutiyilila nakanañachima kukaheka kanakushimunewa (Tell learners to pay attention and listen with understanding to story being told)
Shimunaku kaheka kaseeka kudi atudizi (Tell a simple story to learners)
Tondakuhu atudizi ayedi hela asatu emani nakushimunimu cheñi kaheka kanatiyiwu (Select 3-5 learners to retell the story they heard)
Ihulaku atudizi malwihu anakundami kukaheka (Ask learners questions about the story)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in instruction circle)
Atiyilili nakanañachima kukaheka kanakushimunewa (Listen with understanding to story being told)
Ashimunimu cheñi mukaheka kanashimunewi (Retell the story told)
Akuli malwihu anakundami kukaheka (Answer questions about the story)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwakutiyilila nakanañachima kutuheka twaseeka. (Guide and help learners understand how to listen with comprehension to simple stories)

questions: Malwihu mukuhosha anakundami kukaheka kaseeka anakulewi mwatelela (Questions about simple stories are answered appropriately)
assessment.expected_standard: Atudizi atela kutwesha kutiyilila nakanañachima kutuheka twaseeka mumulungu wumu (Learners should be able to listen with understanding to simple stories in one term)

instructional_blocks.hook: Mwekeshaku nyevulu yamapatani amboka mboka (Show various pattern pictures)
teacher_steps: Mwekeshaku nyevulu yamapatani amboka mboka kudi atudizi (anyifunda, azhinsona...) (Show various pattern pictures to learners)
Mwekeshaku chakukopolola mapatani (Demonstrate how to trace patterns)
Kopololaku mapatani hamu nawatudizi (Trace patterns with learners)
Shakamishaku atudizi mumazanvu (Arrange learners in groups)
Hanaku mapatani asonekewa kudi atudizi mumazanvu kulonda akopololi (Give written patterns to learners in groups to trace)
Lezhaku atudizi akopololi mapatani hamaseki, hayipapilu, hela kuzatisha yikuyuñulu yamboka (Have learners trace patterns on sand, paper, or using other materials)
learner_steps: Atali nyevulu yamapatani amboka mboka (Look at various pattern pictures)
Atali chakukopolola mapatani (Observe how to trace patterns)
Atambuli mapatani asonekewa kufuma kudi ntañishi (Receive written patterns from teacher)
Akopololi mapatani hamaseki, munyikanda nikuzatisha yikuyuñulu yamboka mboka (Trace patterns on sand, paper and using other materials)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwakukopolola mapatani aseeka. (Guide and help learners understand how to trace simple patterns)

instructional_blocks.hook: Imbaku kamina kamashepu (Sing a shapes song)
teacher_steps: Mwekeshaku mashepu aseeka kudi atudizi (tilayango, lekitango, sikweya, seko) (Show simple shapes to learners - triangle, rectangle, square, circle)
Lezhaku atudizi mazhina amashepu (Teach learners names of shapes)
Lezhaku atudizi ateni mazhina amashepu (Have learners identify names of shapes)
Hanaku mashepu kudi atudizi hela sonekaku habodi (Give shapes to learners or draw on board)
Lezhaku atudizi akopololi mashepu mumpepela, hamaseki nikuzatisha yikuyuñulu yamboka mboka (Have learners trace shapes on paper, sand using various materials)
learner_steps: Atali mashepu (tilayango, lekitango, sikweya, seko) (Look at shapes - triangle, rectangle, square, circle)
Atiyilili mazhina amashepu (Listen to names of shapes)
Ateni mazhina amashepu (Identify names of shapes)
Akopololi mashepu hamaseki, nikuzatisha yikuyuñulu yamboka mboka (Trace shapes on sand, using various materials)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwakukopolola mashepu aseeka. (Guide and help learners understand how to trace simple shapes)

teacher_steps: Mwekeshaku kadi yansona (y) kudi atudizi (Show letter card (y) to learners)
Ihulaku atudizi ateni chivumina chansona (y) (Ask learners to identify sound of letter (y))
Mwekeshaku chakukopolola nsona (y) mumpepela, hamaseki hela habodi (Demonstrate how to trace letter (y) on paper, sand or board)
Hanaku makadi ansona (y) kudi atudizi kulonda akopololi (Give letter (y) cards to learners to trace)
Lezhaku atudizi akopololi nsona (y) hamaseki, kuzatisha yikuyuñulu yamboka mboka nimunyikanda (Have learners trace letter (y) on sand, using various materials and in books)
learner_steps: Atali kadi yansona (y) kudi ntañishi (Look at letter (y) card from teacher)
Ateni chivumina chansona (y) (Identify sound of letter (y))
Akopololi nsona (y) hamaseki, kuzatisha yikuyuñulu yamboka mboka nimunyikanda (Trace letter (y) on sand, using various materials and in books)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwakukopolola zhinsona. (Guide and help learners understand how to trace letters)

questions: Mapatani aseeka anakopololewi mwatelela (Simple patterns are traced appropriately)
Mashepu aseeka anakopololewi mwatelela (Simple shapes are traced appropriately)
Zhinsona zhinakopololewi mwatelela (Letters are traced appropriately)
assessment.expected_standard: Atudizi atela kutwesha kukopolola mapatani aseeka, mashepu, nizhinsona mumulungu wumu (Learners should be able to trace simple patterns, shapes and letters in one term)

teacher_steps: Tambikaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Seat learners in instruction circle)
Mwekeshaku mashepu amboka mboka kudi atudizi (Show various shapes to learners)
Lezhaku atudizi ateni mazhina amashepu anakumonawu (Have learners identify names of shapes they see)
Mwekeshaku chakukwata katanishi nakupenta mashepu nikuyilezha nshimbi mwakupentela (Demonstrate how to hold crayon and color shapes and teach proper coloring technique)
Inkaku atudizi mashepu amboka mboka (Give learners various shapes)
Yilezhi atudizi apenti mashepu (Teach learners to color shapes)
Hitakumu nakutala nikukwasha adinakukala (Move around observing and helping those in need)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in instruction circle)
Ateni mashepu anakumonawu (Identify shapes they see)
Eluki chakukwata katanishi nakupenta mashepu (Learn how to hold crayon and color shapes)
Apenti mashepu amboka mboka nakulondela nshimbi mwakupentela (Color various shapes following proper technique)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi nshimbi mwakupentela. (Guide and teach learners proper coloring technique)

teacher_steps: Tambikaku atudizi heluña dakutañishila (Seat learners for instruction)
Mwekeshaku yifunjeka yamboka mboka (Show various objects)
Mwekeshaku chakukwata katanishi (Demonstrate how to hold crayon)
Inkaku atudizi yifunjeka yamboka mboka (Give learners various objects)
Yilezhi apenti yifunjeka (Teach them to color objects)
Hitakumu nakukwasha adinakukala (Move around helping those in need)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit for instruction)
Ateni yifunjeka yinakumonawu (Identify objects they see)
Eluki chakukwata katanishi (Learn how to hold crayon)
Apenti yifunjeka yamboka mboka (Color various objects)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi nshimbi mwakupentela yifunjeka. (Guide and teach learners proper technique for coloring objects)

questions: Mashepu anapentewi mwashikila (Shapes are colored appropriately)
Yifunjeka yinapentewi mwashikila (Objects are colored appropriately)
assessment.expected_standard: Atudizi atela kutwesha kupenta mashepu niyifunjeka munyilungu yiyedi (Learners should be able to color shapes and objects within seven terms)

sub_topics.title: Kuleña
competences: Kuleña yuma yamboka mboka (Draw various things)

teacher_steps: Tambikaku atudizi heluña dakutañila (Seat learners in instruction circle)
Mwekeshaku nyevulu yayuma yamboka mboka yaleñewa (Show pictures of various things to draw)
Lezhaku atudizi ateni yuma yinakumonawu hanyevulu (Have learners identify things they see in pictures)
Mwekeshaku chakukwata pensulu (Demonstrate how to hold pencil)
Yilezhi atudizi aleñi yuma yamboka mboka (Teach learners to draw various things)
Hitakumu nakutala nikukwasha adinakukala (Move around observing and helping those in need)
learner_steps: Ashakami heluña dakutañila (Sit in instruction circle)
Ateni yuma yamboka mboka yinakumonawu hanyevulu (Identify various things seen in pictures)
Eluki chakukwata pensulu (Learn how to hold pencil)
Aleñi yuma yamboka mboka (Draw various things)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Koleshaku nakulezha atudizi kulema kwakuleña yuma yamboka mboka. (Guide and help learners understand how to draw various things)

questions: Yuma yamboka mboka yinaleñewi mwaloña (Various things are drawn correctly)
assessment.expected_standard: Atudizi atela kutwesha kuleña yuma yamboka mboka munyilungu yiyedi (Learners should be able to draw various things within seven terms)

notes: This module is for ECE learners aged 3-4 years, Term 3
The module integrates multiple learning areas: Listening & Speaking, Pre-reading, and Pre-writing
All activities follow the Gradual Release Model (GRM) - teacher demonstrates, does with learners, then learners practice independently
Page numbers refer to the original Lunda ECE Teaching Module document
Each sub-topic includes competences, instructional blocks, vocabulary, and assessment criteria
